text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a potted plant ice cream cake
that's right the second plant doesn't it
it's edible completely edible except for
the flowers just in time for Mother's
Day this is a really fun project so
you're gonna take one pot and I'm doing
this first you know a small portion here
good for 2 or 3 people you can do this
in a bigger pot if you want we're going
to take a nice glaze - flower pot clean
of course and I give a frozen pound cake
that I just sliced up I'm going to put a
couple layers of pound cake just cut it
and shape it alright you want a good
couple inches at the bottom press it in
then I'm going to take a nice straw that
I borrowed from Starbucks because you
want one that's kind of wide and the
ones they sell in the supermarket
usually too skinny so they'll give you a
couple straws they're nice so stick the
straw and push it down make sure it's
centered and I'm going to fill this up
with ice cream I have Moose Tracks you
use the ice cream of your choice I'm
going to go up to about a couple inches
from the top make sure it's pressed in
nice and firm and then that gets put in
the freezer until you're ready to serve
that should be frozen really solid now
for our potting soil that's right we're
going to use Orioles make sure you taste
one make sure they're fresh and if they
are acceptable put them in a bag and
bash them until you have soil it looks
exactly like potting soil so cool once
your ice cream cake is frozen solid and
you're ready to finish you're going to
snip off the straw right at the
ice-cream level you're going to put in
your flowers down the tube I have some
just nice African daisies here use
whatever you want you can even use
plastic flowers or silk flowers and I'm
going to spoon over my potting soil and
it's so cool that a little bit of white
filling I seen from the middle actually
looks like that stuff that's in potting
soil that perlite or whatever it is it
keeps the moisture in the soil this
looks so authentic alright in fact
you're mildly like oh my god you got me
a plan so nice of you and then you're
like no it's a cake and she says oh I
wish it was really a plant I don't eat
cake and then you're like well I eat
cake can I happen so anyway this is a
great idea for Mother's Day really
interesting pull that out for dessert
mom is going to be impressed and by the
way I invented this last year when I saw

if I stole this from your website I'm
sorry but I remember where I saw this I
